title: How to use Pokebattler
intro: Welcome to Pokebattler.com! The BEST and most sophisticated Pokemon Go gym simulator ever invented. Want to know if that Snorlax’s just the stuff? Test every single one of your pokemon to see how they go head to head with other pokemon in the gym. You’ll get a second by second damage report for every battle.
outro: And make sure you check back for upcoming features like logins to save your best gym battlers and more.

intro.text: Dodge strategies are a way to fine tune the attack strategy algorithm to give more realistic results. They are used to account for human error, bugs and other things

options.label: Overall
options.description: A rating that gives an overall score for a particular pokemon. The rating is gives 50% weighting to power, 30% weighting to time to win and 20% to potions

options.label: Power
options.description: A percent that represents how many times a pokemon would kill another. 250% means it would kill it 2 times and then die half way through the 3rd attempt. 75% means it died after only doing 75% of the targets health.

options.label: Time to Win
options.description: Shows the amount of time it would take for the Pokemon to win. 2 seconds is added for each time the pokemon feinted.

options.label: Win %
options.description: Ranks by percentage chance to win

options.label: Potions
options.description: Ranks by number of basic potions it would take to heal plus 5 for each time the pokemon feinted and would need a revive.
